landing.heroDesc: Track Quran memorisation, prayers, fasting, dhikr, and more — all in one beautiful app designed for Muslims.
landing.featuresTitle: Everything you need for your deen
landing.featuresDesc: A comprehensive suite of tools designed for consistency in worship and spiritual growth.
landing.step01Desc: Create your free account — no credit card, no data sharing.
landing.step02Desc: Choose focus areas and daily targets during onboarding.
landing.step03Desc: Log daily, earn achievements, and watch your growth.
landing.whyDesc: Generic habit apps don't understand your deen. We do.
landing.ctaTitle: Ready to transform your daily worship?
landing.ctaDesc: Join thousands of Muslims using Deen Tracker to build consistency, track progress, and grow spiritually.
landing.footerTagline: Built with love for the ummah. Your data is private and encrypted.
landing.quranMemorisationDesc: Track every ayah with spaced repetition, reading mode with bookmarks, and AI explanations.
landing.salahDhikrDesc: Log prayers with on-time/late/missed tracking. Full-screen dhikr focus mode with haptic feedback.
landing.deenTimeTrackerDesc: Measure how much of your day goes to deen. Set goals and see weekly trends.
landing.streaksMilestonesDesc: Build daily habits with streak counters, achievements, badges, and weekly insights.
landing.accountabilityDesc: Partners, circles, chat, and friendly competition. Compare weekly progress.
landing.aiDeenCoachDesc: Get personalised guidance, tafsir, and daily motivation powered by Islamic AI.
landing.faq1A: Yes! Core features are completely free. We believe in making Islamic tools accessible to everyone.
landing.faq2A: Absolutely. Your data is encrypted and stored securely. We never sell or share your personal information with third parties.
landing.faq3A: Yes, Deen Tracker is a Progressive Web App (PWA). Key features like dhikr counting and prayer logging work offline and sync when you're back online.
landing.faq4Q: Can I use it on my phone?
landing.faq4A: Yes! Install it as a PWA on iOS or Android for a native app-like experience. No app store needed.
landing.faq5Q: How does the AI Coach work?
landing.faq5A: Our AI Coach is trained on authentic Islamic sources and provides personalised guidance based on your goals and progress. It's like having a knowledgeable friend available 24/7.
landing.testimonial1Text: Deen Tracker transformed my Quran memorisation journey. The spaced repetition alone is worth it.
landing.testimonial2Text: Having an accountability partner keeps me consistent. I haven't missed Fajr in 3 months!
landing.testimonial3Text: The AI Coach gives thoughtful, relevant advice. It's like having a knowledgeable friend always available.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage your account, preferences, and data
settings.profileDesc: Your display name and account info
settings.changeEmailDesc: A confirmation will be sent to your new email
settings.dataExportDesc: Download all your tracked data — your data belongs to you
settings.aiCoachDataDesc: Manage your AI Coach conversation history
settings.clearChatDesc: This will permanently delete all your AI Coach conversations. This action cannot be undone.
settings.helpFeedbackDesc: Get help or suggest new features
settings.languageDesc: Switch the app to your preferred language
settings.signOutAllDesc: This will end all active sessions
settings.deleteAccountDesc: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This cannot be undone.
settings.deleteConfirmDesc: This will permanently delete your account, all your tracked data (Quran progress, fasting logs, time logs, books, dhikr, goals, chat history), and cannot be undone.
